General.Name: Mirgor S.A. C
General.Description: Mirgor Sociedad Anónima, Comercial, Industrial, Financiera, Inmobiliaria y Agropecuaria engages in the agriculture, innovation, manufacturing, retail, distribution, and logistics businesses in Argentina. The company was founded in 1983 and is based in Buenos Aires, Argentina.
General.Address: Av. Del Libertador 6350, Buenos Aires, Argentina, C1428ART
